author: A_Brickset_user
title: Excellent Technic set
review:
Anon, you probably messed up when you build the truck. It has a lever on its side that you use to lock the trailer into place. 

This set is so underrated. Huge, lots of part, cool alternate model - Lego should make more sets like these.

author: martin_ffm
title: so much fun with this set!!
review: I really like this set, the forklift itsself is quite nice to play and does look realistic. Especially if you build yourself some goods to transport. And the truck with the trailer is also nice. The most I like is probably to drive around with the complete truck, especially backwards. This is really fun, and some serious training

author: Iver_Poulsen
title: My first technic-model
review: This was my first technic-model and an excellent one, which I have build and rebuild several times. It really represent the true spirit of Lego in content, colours and playability. Strongly recommended.
